lenders.occupational_info:
Hope for HIV/AIDS recognizes that the battle against HIV/AIDS, Malaria and Poverty can be won at the community level where the issues practices hold sway. To this effect, the organization creates a platform for linking various communities in fighting these scourges through the following strategies:

o H.E.L.P- HIV/AIDS Enlightenment and Life Program, is our educative channel that we use to create adequate awareness an HIV via workshops, Seminars and talks at varying levels.
o HOME-BASED CARE- This is holistic home visit activities in which we reachout to the poor identify and establish relationship with them.
o o HOPE CORPS: Volunteer who provides Home-based Care to PLWHA.

lenders.name: Kato 2000-2013
lenders.occupational_info:
I was diagnosed with feline hyperthyroidism in late September 2011.  Taking pills twice a day was no fun (for me or my owner) which is why we had to find an alternative treatment.  I was sent to a clinic for Radioiodine I-131 Therapy in mid-October and will find out in January if I have been cured.
UPDATE 2012:  My blood tests in January 2012 show that I no longer have hyperthyroidism.   UPDATE 2013: My beautiful, black cat was diagnosed with soft tissue cancer in early May and had to be put to sleep on May 10, 2013.  I miss my 'mini-panther'.  He was a large part of my life! (Alexandra9167)

lenders.name: Margaret
lenders.loan_because: I was lucky enough to be born into freedom; both fiscal and political.  This program is a way to share my good fortune and to learn about amazing people around the planet making a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I do everything I can to insure the health of the Great Lakes ecosystem for generations to come. There is an amazing amount of water in our region, and water is necessary for life.  I educate people about the Great Lakes and try to instill a sense that we as a global community need to recognize that actively or passively, we are currently making important choices about the future of water as a resource on our planet. I push for active, educated decision making.

lenders.name: Karl
lenders.loan_because: In a perfect world, we would all have equal opportunity.  In our world, we don't.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a fifteen-year-old currently in school.  It is provided for all American families, and after that, I will go off to college, which is a school that I am paying for.  With that, I will be able to get a job that makes me more money that I can not only loan, but donate to help people around the world.
